title: Reflection - mirror and points A through G

content.question: A plane mirror is located near a set of labeled points, as shown in the figure. Light rays originating from point <math alttext="G" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>G</mtext></math> are incident on the entire surface of the mirror. What locations along the right edge of the grid are reached by light rays that are reflected from the mirror?
